body_html:
Can I help out in any way?

Yes :) What I would need is a mapping of Skill Level 1 -> I can do this, I can do that, Skill Level 2 -> I can do that other thing, I can do a handstand w/o hands, … I will continue to just store the numbers, we would need some real world examples for what they represent.

body:
> Can I help out in any way?

Yes :)  What I would need is a mapping of Skill Level 1 -> _I can do this, I can do that_, Skill Level 2 -> _I can do that other thing, I can do a handstand w/o hands_, … I will continue to just store the numbers, we would need some real world examples for what they represent.
